messages.speech: According to my prognosis data, using electricity at #Consumeelectricity-followup.optimalconsumptionstart will generate #Consumeelectricity-followup.optimalemissions  grams of carbon-dioxide per kilowatt hour, compared to #Consumeelectricity-followup.currentemissions grams now. This corresponds to #Consumeelectricity-followup.savingspercentage percent carbon dioxide savings.

According to my prognosis data, using electricity later will generate $optimalemissions  grams of carbon-dioxide per kilowatt hour, compared to $currentemissions grams now. This corresponds to $savingspercentage percent carbon dioxide savings. Is there anything else I can do for you?
